item.title: KO
item.description: score:33 Chances: COKE Announces Increased Net Sales and Gross Profit Amidst Market Challenges The beverage giant sees another strong year ahead Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has more than half of its stock portfolio invested in Apple and Coca-Cola Investing in blue-chip dividend stocks can help you generate a recurring stream of passive income at a low cost Risks: The ten fastest growing energy drink stocks in the U.

item.title: CL
item.description: score:183 Chances: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) has started to reconfirm its growth expectations after strong quarterly results. The global growth outlook was given a boost, helping to ease concerns about crude demand. The company’s Pet Nutrition segment offers potential for growth in the consumer staples sector.
